en.hero_badge: ğŸš€ Master English, Conquer Your Future
en.hero_subtitle: Whether you are preparing for IELTS or aiming for professional fluency, Houria English provides the tools and guidance to help you succeed globally.
en.about_text: Founded by experts with a passion for linguistics, Houria English is more than just a school. We focus on real-world application, cultural nuance, and the psychological confidence needed to speak a second language natively.
en.courses_sub: Designed for rapid progress and lasting results.
en.footer_desc: Empowering professionals and students to conquer the world through language mastery.
en.rights: Â© 2024 Houria English. All rights reserved.

ielts.title: IELTS Mastery
ielts.description: Our IELTS Mastery course is an intensive program designed to help you achieve Band 7.0+ score. We cover all four modules: Listening, Reading, Writing, and Speaking with personalized feedback.

business.title: Business English
business.description: Master the language of global business. Learn to write effective emails, lead meetings, negotiate with confidence, and deliver impactful presentations.

general.title: General Fluency
general.description: Improve your daily conversation skills, expand your vocabulary, and gain the confidence to speak in any social situation.

private.title: Private Coaching
private.description: One-on-one sessions tailored specifically to your goals. Whether it's accent reduction, interview prep, or specific industry terminology.

toefl.title: TOEFL Prep
toefl.description: Strategic preparation for the TOEFL iBT. We focus on the specific skills needed to succeed in the academic environment.

kids.title: Kids English
kids.description: Fun and engaging lessons for children aged 6-12. We use games, stories, and songs to make learning English an adventure.
